==Abilities and Attacks==
''Most attack names are unofficial.''
{{Enemy Attacks
|enemy = 0

|name_1      = State Shift
|desc_1      = When hit by {{Electro}} or {{Pyro}} attacks, the Winged Dendroshroom will enter an Activated or Scorched state respectively, gaining enhanced attacks. A Winged Dendroshroom can only undergo state shift once.
* If the Winged Dendroshroom is defeated while Activated or Scorched, it may drop {{Item|Inactivated Fungal Nucleus}}, {{Item|Dormant Fungal Nucleus}}, and {{Item|Robust Fungal Nucleus}}, while the drop rates for {{Item|Fungal Spores}}, {{Item|Luminescent Pollen}}, and {{Item|Crystalline Cyst Dust}} will greatly reduce.

|name_2      = Slap
|desc_2      = Slaps the player with its wings, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|Physical DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''85% ATK'''.
|file_2      = Winged Dendroshroom Slap
|caption_2   = Normal
|file_2_2    = Winged Dendroshroom Slap 2
|caption_2_2 = Activated
|file_2_3    = Winged Dendroshroom Slap 3
|caption_2_3 = Scorched

|name_3      = Spore Bullet
|desc_3      = Conjures an orb at its tail and throw it at the player, dealing '''70% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Dendro DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''85% ATK'''.
|file_3      = Winged Dendroshroom Orb Throw

|desc_4      = Dives down from above and throws 2 bombs at the player, with each bomb dealing '''85% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Dendro DMG}}.
* '''Activated:''' Speed increased.
* '''Scorched:''' Speed reduced, DMG increased to '''100% ATK''', knockback increased.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A mimetic life form made out of spores that has extreme adaptability.<br />Going well past mere appearances, this being even imitates the habits of birds. It can use its spore-built wings to fly in the sky, spreading yet more spores to yet more distant places.<br />This creature has a position of command amongst colonies of Fungi and exhibits heightened intelligence to match.|[[Archive]]}}
